00022     class GetValue {
00023     public:
00024         GetValue() { }
00025 
00026         GetValue(std::string v, bool s) {
00027             value = v;
00028             success = s;
00029         }
00030 
00031         friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &o, GetValue &gv) {
00032             return o << "{GetValue success=" << gv.success
00033                      << ", value=\"" << gv.value << "\"}";
00034         }
00035 
00039         std::string value;
00043         bool success;
00044     };

00098     class AssertionError : public std::runtime_error {
00099     public:
00100         AssertionError(const char *s) : std::runtime_error(s) { }
00101         AssertionError(const std::string s) : std::runtime_error(s) { }
00102     };
00103 
00107     class Assertions {
00108     public:
00109         inline void assertTrue(bool v, std::string msg) {
00110             if(!v) {
00111                 throw AssertionError(msg);
00112             }
00113         }
00114 
00115         inline void assertFalse(bool v, std::string msg) {
00116             assertTrue(!v, msg);
00117         }
00118 
00119         inline void assertEquals(std::string s1, std::string s2) {
00120             assertTrue(s1.compare(s2) == 0, "failed string compare");
00121         }
00122 
00123         inline void assertEquals(int i1, int i2) {
00124             std::stringstream ss;
00125             ss << "Expected " << i1 << " got " << i2;
00126             assertTrue(i1 == i2, ss.str());
00127         }
00128 
00129         inline void assertNull(std::string *s) {
00130             if (s != NULL) {
00131                 std::string msg = "expected null, got ``" + *s + "''";
00132                 throw AssertionError(msg);
00133             }
00134         }
00135 
00136         inline void assertNotNull(std::string *s) {
00137             assertTrue(s != NULL, "expected nonnull");
00138         }
00139     };
00140 }
